rooms.description: Entrance hall with natural light, Vastu-compliant layout
Large open living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and an eco-friendly design using sustainable materials
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with ample natural light
Modern eco-friendly kitchen design integrated with energy-efficient appliances and natural lighting
Separate living space for the servants incorporating Vastu principles ensuring proper circulation
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and eco-friendly design, aligned with Vastu principles
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, featuring sustainable materials
ensuite bathroom attached to master bedroom with efficient water fixtures
Master bedroom on the upper level with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and Vastu-aligned layout
Additional bedroom ensuring ample space for family members, designed with eco-friendly practices
ensuite bathroom attached to the secondary master bedroom
